jp_text: フニャーでやんす…。ニャー 死んだふり　死んだふり…。
google_translated: I'm going to do it ....Nya Dead Five Full ....

en_text: Who the hell are you?
jp_text: ニャンだ？おめえは。 わっ！！
google_translated: Is it Nyan?Thank you.Wow!!

en_text: W-Who is he? he's not just some cat!
jp_text: ≪な　何だこいつ！？≫ ≪ただのネコじゃねえ！≫
google_translated: «What is it??»« It's just a cat!»

en_text: He's a demon! A demon!
jp_text: ≪アクマだ　悪魔～！！≫ ≪悪魔！≫
google_translated: «Akuma devil ~!!»« Devil!»

en_text: He's gonna chomp us to death!
jp_text: 噛み殺されるぞ！ 逃げろ～！！
google_translated: It will be biting!Run away!!

en_text: Be-san... You and Ko-san  were so cool back then!
jp_text: ベッさん…さっきの　こ～さんと ベッさん　カッコよかったっす。
google_translated: Bet ... Mr. Betto and Beck is cool.

en_text: I think I'm going to try and make a  friend for myself just like you two are!
jp_text: わても　自分と同じ奴らと→
google_translated: Even the same people as himself →

en_text: I am sorry for being so selfish as  to beg your leave... But, please...
jp_text: 勝手なお願いですが　どうか…。
google_translated: It is a selfish request.

en_text: Thank you so much!
jp_text: ありがとうございました。
google_translated: Thank you very much.

en_text: Bro, they were so scary!
jp_text: ≪兄貴　すっげえ怖かったさ～≫ ≪さすがホンマもんは違うニャ≫ ≪くわばらくわばらでゲス≫
google_translated: «« 兄 げ さ さ »» «« «ホ ホ 違 違» »« «ゲ ゲ ゲ ゲ ゲ» »»

en_text: Knock on wood...
Now, Master, eat up as much as you'd like.
jp_text: さあ　坊っちゃま。お好きなだけ お食べ下さいまし。
google_translated: Sanoba.Please eat as much as you like.

en_text: I have plenty more.
jp_text: おかわりも たくさんありますからね。
google_translated: There are many other words.
